meanings.definition: Awkward or clumsy in movement or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The gawky puppy tripped over its own paws.
meanings.sent2: She felt gawky as she tried to dance at the party.
meanings.sent3: The gawky waiter spilled drinks on the customers, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His gawky attempts at basketball made him the laughingstock of the team.
meanings.sent5: The gawky giraffe struggled to reach the leaves on the tall tree.

meanings.definition: Lacking grace or ease in manner or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The gawky teenager blushed when asked to speak in front of the class.
meanings.sent2: Her gawky movements made her stand out in the elegant ballroom.
meanings.sent3: Despite his gawky behavior, he always managed to make people smile.
meanings.sent4: The gawky swan glided across the pond with an air of awkward elegance.
meanings.sent5: The gawky child tried to imitate the graceful ballet dancer but ended up stumbling.
